item.title: Markup for all
item.description: The importance of meaninfulness in Web 의미있는 이름짓기의 중요성(네이밍&마크업) There are only two hard problems in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things — Phil Karlton Web technologies for all Accessibility & Web Standards = BETTER WORLD 웹표준과 접근성 그리고 호
